title: Australian gold rushes. - Years 4-6.
brief_description: An edited version of “Australian gold rushes. Yrs. 7-10”. Provides a general overview of the Australian gold rush period 1850-1900. It is presented in three segments: 1. “Discoveries”. - 2. “Gold rushes, 1800-1900”. - 3. “Mining methods”. Consists of re-enactments, segments from early Australian feature films and stills from the period.
